```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)

```
# Učitavanje podataka
Učitavamo podatke i analiziramo kako oni izgledaju.
```{r}
players.data = read_xls("NHL_2016-17.xls")
head(players.data)
goalies.data = read_xls("NHL_Goalies_2016-17.xls")
head(goalies.data)
```
```{r}
numberOfRows = nrow(players.data)
y <- players.data[c(3:numberOfRows),]
x <- y[,166, data = FALSE]
head(x)
```
```{r}
x <- x %>% drop_na()
z <- as.numeric(unlist(x))
View(z)
h = hist(z, main="Salary histogram",
         xlab="salary",
         ylab='number of players',
         col="blue"
)
```
